resume_text:
Abhishek Jha
♂phone6289716964 |/envel⌢pejhaa213152@gmail.com |/linkedinlinkedin.com/abhishek |/githubgithub.com/abhishek |/codeleetcode.com/abhishek
Education

Shree Jain Vidyalaya kolkata
Higher Secondary Education Apr 2021
Hind Motor High School kolkata
Secondary Education Mar 2019
Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, good to meet you.  

Your resume shows experience with React and React Native.  Can you tell me about a challenging problem you solved using React in one of your projects?
I'm doing well, thank you.  Let's get back to your React experience. Can you describe a challenging problem you solved using React, focusing on the specific technical challenge and your solution?

when I was very new to react I used to take or basically do questions and at that time the basically the state management was very difficult I used to pass the state to another component by basically passing it and then finally I came to know about the redox then are the all everything become very much basically a very helpful so yeah
Okay, Abhishek.  That's good you learned about Redux.  Can you describe a specific React project where you used Redux, and what problem it solved?  Focus on the specific issue and your solution.

React.notes: Abhishek demonstrates basic familiarity with React, specifically acknowledging initial struggles with state management.  He mentions successfully adopting Redux, but lacks the ability to articulate a specific project and the problem it solved in a clear and concise manner.  He needs to work on demonstrating a deeper understanding of React concepts and their practical application in real-world projects.

ReactNative.notes: His resume lists React Native as a skill, but the interview did not provide any insights into his proficiency with this technology.

Redux.notes: He knows about Redux and recognizes its value in state management, but can't provide concrete examples of its usage. This suggests a theoretical understanding rather than practical experience.

Other.notes: His resume mentions Express and Firebase, but no discussion of these technologies occurred during the interview.

communicationSkills.notes: Abhishek's communication is unclear and disorganized.  He struggles to articulate his thoughts in a structured manner, often using filler words and lacking specific examples. His responses are not concise and struggle to address the interviewer's question directly. The greeting was also casual to the point of being unprofessional.

problemSolvingAbilities.notes: Abhishek identified a problem (state management in React) and found a solution (Redux), but he cannot provide concrete examples of how he applied this solution in a real project. He needs practice articulating his problem-solving approach in a clear and detailed way.

culturalFit.notes: The interview provides insufficient information to assess cultural fit.  Further discussion about teamwork, work ethic, and company values would be needed.

strengths: Recognizes the importance of tools like Redux for efficient development
Demonstrates a willingness to learn new technologies
weaknesses: Inability to articulate specific examples of projects and problem-solving
Lack of clear demonstration of technical proficiency in React and related technologies
assessment.overallImpression: Abhishek shows potential but requires significant improvement in communication and practical application of his technical skills.  He needs to focus on developing his ability to articulate complex technical concepts clearly and concisely, and showcase his expertise through detailed examples from his projects.
recommendationsForImprovement: Practice explaining technical concepts clearly and concisely, focusing on specific examples from past projects.
Work on improving communication skills through speaking practice and feedback.
Develop deeper proficiency in React, React Native, and other mentioned technologies by building more substantial projects.
Focus on developing stronger problem-solving skills by documenting and articulating the steps involved in resolving technical challenges.
Review standard interview etiquette and professionalism.
